thread.title: Stephanie Davis shares adorable picture of Caben-Albi hours after it emerges that she is reunited with Jeremy McConnell
thread.title_full: Stephanie Davis shares adorable picture of Caben-Albi hours after it emerges that she is reunited with Jeremy McConnell

author: lfranklin
title: Stephanie Davis shares adorable picture of Caben-Albi hours after it emerges that she is reunited with Jeremy McConnell
text:
TV Magazine WHAT A CUTIE Stephanie Davis shares adorable picture of Caben-Albi hours after it emerges that she is reunited with Jeremy McConnell 
After 10 months of heartbreak and drama the young parents are on their way to becoming a happy family By Lauren Franklin, Showbiz Reporter 20th February 2017, 10:07 pm Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments STEPHANIE Davis has shared an adorable picture of her new born son Caben-Albi just hours have pictures emerged that prove she is reunited with his dad Jeremy McConnell. 
In the adorable snap the little boy – who bears a striking resemblance to Jez, is dressed in a grey tank top with a long-sleeved white polo shirt underneath. 
— 🅢🅣🅔🅟🅗🅐🅝🅘🅔 (@Stephdavis77) February 20, 2017 
He looks cosy as he lies on a soft elephant rug which has been inscribed with his name. 
Steph simply captioned the image “Caben-Albi” with a blue heart and elephant emoji, and showing some virtual love for his son, Jeremy “liked” the tweet. 
The former warring exes looked the picture of happiness in these bombshell snaps as they strolled side-by-side with their little boy in Liverpool, just weeks after their ugly paternity row came to an end. WENN Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell are making a go at being a happy family RELATED STORIES BABY YOU CAN'T DRIVE YOUR CAR Paul McCartney's dozy daughter Stella rear-ends cabbie's car and drives off without giving her details LOVE DOCTOR All you need to know about Celebs Go Dating relationship expert Eden Blackman Match me if you can Meet Lady Nadia Essex, the celebrity dating expert trying to find Ferne McCann love Sweet treat Phillip Schofield shows off his buns as he poses for cheeky picture at The Girls musical gala night AGAINST ALL ODDS Mariah Carey swapped her engagement ring for a toyboy - here's the lowdown on Bryan Tanaka LOWE AND BEHOLD Daisy Lowe narrowly avoids exposing herself in extremely plunging dress at LFW RUMBLE IN JUNGLE I'm A Celebrity 2017 rumours have already started and we know who's on the jungle hot list THE MAKING OF A POP ICON From addiction to depression... Britney Ever After biopic delves into the singer's troubled past WE SHOULD BE SO LUCKY Kylie Minogue watches the sun rise and thanks fans after her split with fiancé Joshua Sasse 'ALL ABOUT SELF LOVE' Ashley James oozes body confidence as she poses in her underwear for mirror selfie LOVE TO KNOW The Celebs Go Dating receptionist was a former contestant on The Voice... all you need to know fifty shaves of frank Footie aces Frank Lampard and John Terry confess to shaving 'back, sack and cracks' on TV 
The pair were all smiles as they wandered together, even touching each other as they cooed over their son. 
It is the first time the family have been pictured together since Jeremy admitted he was Caben-Albi’s father following months of warring between the pair. I'll love this monkey with every bit of me❤️😍 pic.twitter.com/0b4QMnGlRS 
— Jeremy McConnell (@JezzaMcConnell) February 11, 2017 
On Sunday Stephanie revealed she is feeling “content” after spending the past few days with her ex and their lad. 
The former couple had been at war with each other for most of 2016 after Stephanie revealed her unexpected pregnancy news, but it appears the former flames have been able to spend a “lovely” few days together ever since Jeremy’s paternity test confirmed he is the child’s father. Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell looking happy with their baby in a park
